prod_desc: Get all fired up at Garmadon’s Volcano Lair!
prod_long_desc:
Join Zane’s mission to infiltrate evil Garmadon’s Volcano Lair and take on the shark army, with this exciting THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ set. The base includes a minifigure-launch function at the tip of the volcano, Garmadon’s throne room, computer lab with a mini piranha mech prototype, construction zone with an exploding wall function and rotating crane to lift the included shark figure, plus a drone launch pad. This building toy also includes 5 minifigures.
Includes 5 minifigures: Garmadon, Zane, General #1, Steve and Four Eyes, plus a shark figure.
Garmadon’s Volcano Lair features an entrance shaped like Garmadon’s face, minifigure-launch function at the tip of the volcano, Garmadon’s throne room, computer lab, construction zone, drone launchpad, translucent-orange lava elements and blue water-style baseplates.
Garmadon's throne room features a big seat, teapot and pot elements, fish tank with 2 fish elements and a weapon rack with arrow and sai weapons.
Use the fish elements to create a buildable shark army weapon.
Computer lab features a computer keyboard and screen elements, mini piranha mech prototype and a coffee machine with cup element.
Construction zone features a rotating crane to lift the shark figure, a wheel-operated exploding wall function and a flick missile.
Also includes a drone launchpad and shell drone with foldout wings.
Evade the shark's snapping jaws.
Weapons include Garmadon's staff and katana, Zane’s bow and arrow, General #1’s fish sai and Four Eyes’ fish spear.
Also includes Zane’s quiver element.
General #1, Steve and Four Eyes minifigures are all new for December 2017.
Recreate and role-play exciting THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ scenes.
This building toy is suitable for ages 8-14.
Measures over 10” high, 12” wide and 6” long.
